alert.note: Alert for Calvert; Charles; St. Marys (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 13 at 12:26AM EDT until July 13 at 1:15AM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Sterling Virginia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... West central St. Marys County in southern Maryland... Southeastern Calvert County in southern Maryland... South central Charles County in southern Maryland... * Until 115 AM EDT. * At 1225 AM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Colonial Beach, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. * Locations impacted include... Lexington Park, Leonardtown, Tall Timbers, Saint Clements Bay, Town Creek, White Point Beach, California, Hollywood, Wicomico, Mechanicsville, Rock Point, Bushwood, Clements, Abell, Valley Lee, Chaptico, Sandgates, Great Mills, Avenue and Loveville. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
